Class BlobstoreController

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller.InputController

public abstract class BlobstoreController
extends br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller.Controller

A Controller version that contains utilities methods to handler the GAE Blobstore facilities.

Author:
Danilo Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Method Detail

uploadUrl

protected final String uploadUrl(String successPath)
Gets the blobservice upload url.

Parameters:
successPath - The url to blobservice redirect after a successful upload.
Returns:
the blobservice upload url.

blobKey

protected final com.google.appengine.api.blobstore.BlobKey blobKey(String file)
Gets the BlobKey a uploaded file.

Parameters:
file - the uploaded file's name - the name used by the form to define the file
Returns:
The BlobKey fot the given file, or null if there's no file uploaded with the given name
Throws:
IllegalStateException - If not called from a blob upload callback request.

serve

Serves a file with the given BlobKey

Parameters:
blobKey - the file's BlobKey
